note: Hi All, I'm a 61 year old activist, working, with others to get a better government in the UK and to rejoin the EU. When I set out to become more active in UK politics I needed to find a group that thought like me. That turned out to be RebootGB set up to make well-founded suggestions about how to improve UK politics. I'm one of 6 "guiding members" helping run the group, although in their company I'm having a bit of "imposter" syndrome üòÄ
